trans-unit.source: Enables security checking on calls to a component.
trans-unit.target: 在對元件呼叫時啟用安全性檢查。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ComponentAccessControlAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ComponentAccessControlAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ComponentAccessControlAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ComponentAccessControlAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to enable security checking on calls to a component; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要在對元件呼叫時啟用安全性檢查，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ComponentAccessControlAttribute" /> class and sets the <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.ComponentAccessControlAttribute.Value" /> property to indicate whether to enable COM+ security configuration.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.EnterpriseServices.ComponentAccessControlAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體，並設定 <see cref="P:System.EnterpriseServices.ComponentAccessControlAttribute.Value" /> 屬性以指出是否要啟用 COM+ 安全性組態。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether to enable security checking on calls to a component.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否在對元件呼叫時啟用安全性檢查。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if security checking is to be enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用安全性檢查，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
